testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user register with valid data..........................................passed Then user should register successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could login with authorised accounts
testcase.name: guest user could login with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter valid data..................................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could login with authorised accounts
testcase.name: guest user couldn't login with invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter invalid data................................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | users could change the currency
testcase.name: guest user could change the currency
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter valid data..................................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed And user choose Euro currency from dropdown list............................passed Then user change the currency successfully..................................passed
